snippet: More than 40,000 people have been displaced in the last week from the Iraqi city of Mosul, where U.S.-backed forces launched a fresh push towards the Islamic State-held old city center on Sunday and closed in on the main government complex....

headline.main: After Bombs, Pakistan Tightens Security for Rare Major Cricket Match
headline.print_headline: After Bombs, Pakistan Tightens Security for Rare Major Cricket Match

lead_paragraph: More than 40,000 people have been displaced in the last week from the Iraqi city of Mosul, where U.S.-backed forces launched a fresh push towards the Islamic State-held old city center on Sunday and closed in on the main government complex.
